javadoc.text: * PInputEventListener defines the most basic interface for objects that * want to listen to PNodes for input events. This interface is very simple so * that others may extend Piccolo's input management system. If you are just * using Piccolo's default input management system then you will most often use * PBasicInputEventHandler to register with a node for input events. *
javadoc.author: Jesse Grosjean

javadoc.text: * Called whenever an event is emitted. Used to notify listeners that an * event is available for proecessing.
